title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes.

faqs.question: Where is Hulu General Commission located?
faqs.answer: Hulu General Commission is located in Addis Ababa, Legehar, Amhara Bank Building, 1st Floor, Room 112.

faqs.question: How does the payment work?
faqs.answer: When you get a job, you pay 20% of your first salary. For other services, payment is made through agreements.

faqs.question: How much commission do you accept?
faqs.answer: We only take a one-time commission of 20% from your first salary.

faqs.question: Do you take commissions every month?
faqs.answer: No, we only take the commission once.

faqs.question: Are you open every day, including Sunday?
faqs.answer: No, we work 6 days a week, except Sunday, from 2:00 to 12:00.

faqs.question: Is Hulu General Commission a legal company?
faqs.answer: Yes, of course, we are a legally registered company.

faqs.question: What types of work do you provide?
faqs.answer:
We offer various services including:
- Connecting job seekers
- Buying and selling houses & cars
- Website development
- Software development
- Desktop applications
- AI & Machine Learning
- Graphics design
- UI/UX design
- Social media management

faqs.question: Do you have branches in other regions?
faqs.answer: No, we only have one location in Addis Ababa, Legehar.

faqs.question: What are your working hours?
faqs.answer: We work from 2:00 to 12:00, except on Sundays.
